name: Rubber Fig (GGJ 2023)
description:
You and a friend have to build bridges made of living tree roots to try to find each other and help out some of the locals along the way. 

This game is inspired by the Khasi people of the state of Meghalaya in Northeast India, who have an ancient art form of redirecting the growth of the roots of living rubber fig trees to create walkable bridges across streams and ravines.
